LenovoPortForwardingMap.description: This is Lenovo extended properties of USB port forwarding.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

AddressMode.description: External network address mode for IPv4 or IPv6.
AddressMode.longDescription: The value of this property shall be external network address mode for IPv4 or IPv6. Supported values are 1 (IPv4) and 2 (IPv6). The property shall not be present/used if Type is equal to 'EthtoUSB'.

DefaultIPEnabled.description: Identify whether the default CMM IP address is used.
DefaultIPEnabled.longDescription: The value of this property shall be boolean identifying whether the default CMM IP address is used.

ExternalPort.description: The network IP port of external address.
ExternalPort.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the network IP port of external address.

IPAddress.description: The network IP address configured as the pass through external address.
IPAddress.longDescription: The value of this property shall be network IP address configured as the pass through external address. The property shall not be present/used if Type is equal to 'EthtoUSB'.

Initialized.description: Identify whether the configuration data of the pass through functionality is initialized.
Initialized.longDescription: The value of this property shall be boolean identifying whether the configuration data of the pass through functionality is initialized.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

Type.description: The type of network port forwarding.
Type.longDescription: A connection direction between its external network interface and the server.

USBPort.description: The network IP port of ethernet over USB.
USBPort.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the network IP port of ethernet over USB.

enumDescriptions.EthtoUSB: From external Ethernet to Ethernet over USB.
enumDescriptions.USBtoEth: From Ethernet over USB to external Ethernet.

title: #LenovoPortForwardingMap.v1_0_0.LenovoPortForwardingMap
